content: the hazelnut henley sweater is the perfect crochet sweater for cozy weekends at home or for running errands the oversized relaxed fit makes this sweater incredibly comfortable to wear and the henley button detail adds a sweet little to this timeless sweater this crochet pattern uses simple construction and basic stitches making this sweater easy to crochet ad-free pdf pattern https //www etsy com/listing/1412416677/crochet-pattern-modern-henley-sweater
